summary: Project involves a lobby that should show rooms on first load; production still appears to apply filtering too early or is serving a stale cached bundle, causing the fix not to take effect.
architectural_notes: Implement reliable cache-busting/versioning for production assets (e.g., hashed filenames and/or CDN invalidation) to prevent stale bundles after deployments.
known_issues: Production deployment may still be serving a stale cached bundle, so lobby filtering fixes are not reflected live (rooms still not shown on first load).
